Plot: An aging, out-of-work actress accepts one last job, though the consequences of her decision affect her in ways she didn't consider.
Title: The Congress
Actors: Robin Wright, Harvey Keitel, Jon Hamm, Kodi Smit-McPhee
tomatoConsensus: The Congress rises on the strength of Robin Wright's powerful performance, with enough ambitious storytelling and technical thrills to overcome its somewhat messy structure.
Country: Israel, Germany, Poland, Luxembourg, Belgium, France
